nodes.name: Execute Command Wait For OpenClaw Result

parameters.command: =mkdir -p "{{$json.meta.review_dir}}"; for i in $(seq 1 {{$env.OPENCLAW_RESULT_POLL_TRIES || 120}}); do if [ -f "{{$json.meta.review_dir}}/openclaw_result.json" ]; then cat "{{$json.meta.review_dir}}/openclaw_result.json"; exit 0; fi; sleep {{$env.OPENCLAW_RESULT_POLL_INTERVAL_SECONDS || 2}}; done; META_JSON='{{ JSON.stringify($json.meta) }}'; {{$env.PYTHON_BIN || 'python3'}} /Users/Code/workflow/translation/scripts/openclaw_translation_orchestrator.py --meta-json "$META_JSON" >/tmp/openclaw_fallback_{{$json.job_id}}.log 2>&1 || true; if [ -f "{{$json.meta.review_dir}}/openclaw_result.json" ]; then cat "{{$json.meta.review_dir}}/openclaw_result.json"; else echo '{"ok":false,"status":"needs_revision","errors":["openclaw_result_timeout","openclaw_fallback_failed"]}'; fi

main.node: Execute Command Wait For OpenClaw Result
